Module com.mycompany.projectm3
Package com.mycompany.projectm3.Operation

Class Operation

java.lang.Object
com.mycompany.projectm3.Operation.Operation
public class Operation extends Object
Represents an ATM operation (withdraw, deposit, transfer)
